body.name: Disney Baby Jive 2 in 1 Convertible Car Seat,Rear-Facing 5-40 pounds and Forward-Facing 22-65 pounds, Minnie Stripes
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 33 mins
features: An extra-comfortable ride that lasts for years: rear-facing 5-40 pounds and forward-facing 22-65 pounds
Fits 3 across in the back seat of most vehicles
body.description: Parenting is filled with so many important decisions it can make your head spin. With the Disney jive convertible car seat, you have one less decision to make because you get two seats in one. It keeps your child safe, from 5-65 pounds. Your baby can ride comfortably rear facing up to 40 pounds. When the time comes, your "big kid" Can ride forward facing up to 65 pounds.The Disney jive 2-in-1 car seat is perfect for your growing family, too. You can fit three (incredibly well-behaved youngsters) in the back seat of most cars.&Nbsp; the Disney jive convertible car seat also puts your safety concerns at ease with the built-in side impact protection and 5-point harness. The harness features 5 heights and 3 buckle locations to perfectly fit your growing child.Its comfortable for kids and convenient for parents, too. The removable insert pillows provide extra head and body support. As your little one grows, The cushions easily remove, and your big kid will love the extra comfy ride that the plush padding provides.Who has time to constantly clean up messes? Certainly not you. The fabric is both machine washable and dryer safe, making this seat super easy to clean when messes happen.Stressed about traveling with kids? The jive convertible car seat is certified for use on an aircraft. Its compact design also makes it easier to manage through airport security checks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, east to install, front-facing carseat
reviews.reviewText: This car seat works perfect for my toddler who just graduated to forward-facing. Quality is good for a toddler seat and the Minnie Mouse design is cute. The straps were easy to adjust and the latch system was very easy to connect in my car. I don’t have any issues with the cup holders as far as some of the complaints I read before purchasing this. Overall very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable&easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: We love this car seat. My daughter was 21 months old when we got this and she’s 3ft tall and weighs good amount lol she still has room to grow with it! She loves the Minnie design. My only thing is the cup holders came off easy so she was able to lose them quick (I just put them back natural consequence she has to hold her drink). It’s easy and quick to remove the insert and washes well. No loose threads. It’s also easy to put back together!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter love it a lot.Cute and compact.I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You’ll might need help installing it? Maybe that’s just me 🥲
reviews.reviewText: Got this car seat as a gift for my boyfriend’s daughter & it was good quality, well packaged, and kind of easy to install? I was able to figure it out fairly easily, but maybe I’m just a little rusty on car seat installation 😅. It was simple to figure out how to install it as a front facing & rear facing & it works great as both. I’m not sure if it was how I installed them, but the cup holders feel a bit flimsy, like they won’t stay clipped into their spot. Might need to mess with it a bit more, but so far he says it works & his daughter is comfy and doesn’t fuss while she’s in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great overall, but could be better.
reviews.reviewText: This car seat is much slimmer than your average car seat (see photo, compared to a Safety 1st car seat) & you have to pop the cup holders in yourself - they’re not built in, but they can be inserted in on your own, which I can see being an issue in the future as my son loves to throw things. It’s an absolutely adorable seat though and it fits perfectly inside of my 2008 Ford Escape (in the center row, too!) but I just hope there’s enough padding to it considering how slim it is. I do really like the height, though, because my son is very tall & I think he’ll appreciate that very much as he grows. So overall, it could be better but I also don’t really have any major complaints either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up and install. Great product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: She definitely appreciates seeing in this new chair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable car seat
reviews.reviewText: The design is so cute! My daughter loves it. The seat itself was easy to install and fits perfectly! Comfortable cushioning, perfect colors, and fairly easy to clean!I dislike the cup holders on this seat. They are removable and fall off often, and they aren’t deep enough to actually hold a cup or bottle. We ended up just taking the cup holders off completely.
